entry.title: Police Log: January 27, 2026

entry.title: Aviva Health Steps In to Provide Child Advocacy Services in Douglas County After Douglas C.A.R.E.S. Closure
entry.summary: Aviva Health has begun providing child advocacy services in Douglas County after the Jan. 1 closure of Douglas C.A.R.E.S. The transition ensures children continue to receive forensic interviews and medical exams through coordinated referrals from law enforcement and state child welfare agencies.

entry.title: Wilson's Chapel of the Roses welcomes public to view comprehensive renovations
entry.summary: It survived the Roseburg Blast, several changes in ownership and over a century of use, but Wilson's Chapel of the Roses hadn't had a renovation in nearly 50 years.

entry.title: Drain's only grocery store, Ray's Food Place closing in February
entry.summary: Ray's Food Place is the only grocery in Drain and it's now set to close next month. Residents say this is a huge issue because the next closest grocery store is 16 miles away.
